title: The new champ is gonna be cancer to play against.
body:
So if she hits you with her E and beat ur motionless spirit OR you run out of range you get a 1 minute debuff that spawns shit on the walls to hit you/your team, other than the fact it also deals 30~50% of ur total health.

The spell has 50 mana cost and 20s cd at rank 1, basically you're going to be debuffed permanently in lane and in a whole team fight, if she hits a single skillshot, shit's broken.
